alert.note: Alert for Beadle; Kingsbury; Miner; Sanborn (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 1:02PM MDT until July 05 at 1:30PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CDT FOR WESTERN KINGSBURY...NORTHERN SANBORN...EASTERN BEADLE AND MINER COUNTIES... At 159 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles north of Artesian, or 20 miles southeast of Huron, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 140 PM CDT, a 76 mph gust was reported 3 miles northwest of Wosley. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe storm will be near... Carthage and Fedora around 210 PM CDT. Roswell around 215 PM CDT. Vilas around 220 PM CDT. Howard around 225 PM CDT. Canova around 230 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Bancroft and Broadland. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This is a dangerous storm, capable of producing large hail driven by severe winds! SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! If you are caught outdoors, cover your head and neck.
